content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for considering my apartment. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what your budget is for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 1000 Euros per month.

I would like to see the apartment first and then discuss the rental price. Are you available to show me the apartment on Friday at 2pm?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Ryanah. I will make sure that the apartment is available for you to view on Friday at 2pm. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we meet up?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
No, that's all. Thank you for your time.

I look forward to seeing the apartment.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Ryanah. I'm looking forward to meeting you and showing you the apartment. Let's talk more about the rental price when we meet up.
name: Heinrich Heine
